content.raw:
I'm having an issue with sending footstepdatalistrosmessage to the robot. It seems that using the newly developed msg isn't currently compatible with the software on the robot right now. This is the error msg:

```
#!

[ERROR] [1489786389.812118619]: Client [/ihmc_ros/valkyrie/controller] wants topic /ihmc_ros/valkyrie/control/footstep_list to have datatype/md5sum [ihmc_msgs/FootstepDataListRosMessage/4a4566009cfa3ecc97d3d4b54299c4cc], but our version has [ihmc_msgs/FootstepDataRosMessage/c1fbe47501162f4d3ae6a243380c56d7]. Dropping connection.

```
Hopefully we can get this resolved soon.
content.html:
I'm having an issue with sending footstepdatalistrosmessage to the robot. It seems that using the newly developed msg isn't currently compatible with the software on the robot right now. This is the error msg:

[ERROR] [1489786389.812118619]: Client [/ihmc_ros/valkyrie/controller] wants topic /ihmc_ros/valkyrie/control/footstep_list to have datatype/md5sum [ihmc_msgs/FootstepDataListRosMessage/4a4566009cfa3ecc97d3d4b54299c4cc], but our version has [ihmc_msgs/FootstepDataRosMessage/c1fbe47501162f4d3ae6a243380c56d7]. Dropping connection.

Hopefully we can get this resolved soon.
